articles.title: Award-winning brand Koh with more than 100k glowing reviews launches laundry system Aussies have been waiting for
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Koh is launching a new fragrance-free, dermatologist-tested laundry range consisting of Sensitive Stain Remover, Sensitive Laundry Sheets, and Sensitive Laundry Liquid. The products are designed to be skin-safe, tough on stains, and environmentally friendly, using enzyme science to lift stains without harsh chemicals. The Sensitive Stain Remover costs $28.95, the Sensitive Laundry Sheets cost $21.95 for 50 washes, and the Sensitive Laundry Liquid costs $25.95 for 60 washes.

articles.title: 33 Things That *Feel* Like Impulse Buys But Once You Realize How Practical They Are, You'll Have Zero Guilt
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: OPI introduces RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish for fast at-home manicures. EOS launches Cashmere Skin Collection Shave Oil, a complement to their popular body lotion, designed for sensitive skin. Dash offers both a rapid egg cooker for streamlined egg preparation and My Mug Ice Cream Maker for making individual servings of ice cream.

articles.title: Neo Wants to Usher in the Era of ‘Robotics Slop'
articles.summary: 1x Technologies has announced the launch of Neo, a fabric-wrapped home robot. A nearly 10-minute video showcasing Neo has been released by the company, highlighting its features and intended use as a member of the family.

articles.title: AI Innovations That Are Changing How Businesses Operate
articles.summary: AI is enabling businesses to introduce new services and features. These include personalized marketing through data analysis, AI-powered customer service platforms for 24/7 support, and AI security features that improve tracking, security, and intelligent automation to streamline processes like data entry, HR onboarding, and invoice processing.

articles.title: Windows 11 Update Enhances Productivity with a New Customizable Start Menu and Improved App Discovery Experience
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Microsoft released a new Windows 11 update that overhauls the Start Menu, focusing on user customization and streamlined access to frequently used applications. Key features include dynamic pinning, folder organization for pinned apps, an adjustable layout, improved app discovery, and enhanced search algorithm which integrates the Microsoft Store. These changes aim to reduce time spent searching for apps and streamline workflows, increasing efficiency and improving the overall user experience.

articles.title: Mister Car Wash Announces Third Quarter 2025 Results
articles.author: Mister Car Wash
articles.summary: Mister Car Wash acquired five stores in Lubbock, TX, thereby significantly expanding its market presence. This strategic move is part of the company's focus on expanding its footprint and delivering a premier car wash experience.

articles.title: Parcel Perform Defines 'GEO' for E-Commerce with Launch of AI Commerce Visibility  Oct. 29, 2025 22:00
articles.summary: Parcel Perform has launched AI Commerce Visibility, a new platform designed to help e-commerce businesses monitor, analyze, and improve their visibility across AI shopping agents like ChatGPT and Gemini. This platform bridges brand visibility directly to operational performance and helps brands understand how AI agents recommend products based on factors beyond keywords, such as delivery speed and return policies.

articles.title: AI-assisted content creation will lower the barrier to creativity but raise quality: Adobeâs Govind Balakrishnan
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Adobe introduced an AI Assistant in Adobe Express. The AI Assistant allows users to edit projects using simple, conversational language, removing the barriers of traditional design software. Users can describe desired changes in natural language, which the assistant interprets contextually to make design decisions.

articles.title: PRIMO BRANDS CELEBRATES GROUNDBREAKING OF NEW MOUNTAIN VALLEY FACTORY
articles.author: Primo Brands Corporation
articles.summary: Primo Brands Corporation is building a new factory to support the high demand for their premium brand, The Mountain Valley.

articles.title: How to Stream on the Go With a VPN
articles.author: Rollingstone
articles.summary: NordVPN provides tools that simplify streaming favorite content remotely. These tools enhance the user's ability to access and enjoy content from outside their home network.

articles.title: Samsung's trifold prototype breaks cover at APEC: A glimpse at the next big leap in foldables
articles.author: ET Online
articles.summary: Samsung showcased a prototype of its Galaxy Tri-Fold phone at the APEC summit, featuring a 'G' shape inward folding design and a dual-hinge setup. Expected to launch within the year, this next-generation device could potentially retail between $3,000 and $3,500.

articles.title: Meet NEO from 1X: The world's first humanoid home robot just went on sale - here's how to order
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching NEO, a humanoid home robot designed for everyday consumers. It can walk, carry, lift, and respond to voice commands, assisting with household tasks. NEO is available for pre-order in the U.S. for $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription, with deliveries starting in 2026.

articles.title: Motor City Machine Guns Launch Signature Coffee Blend for Fans and Baristas Alike
articles.author: Luis Mendoza
articles.summary: The Motor City Machine Guns have partnered with New Order Coffee Roasters to launch the 'Motor City Machine Guns blend,' a coffee now available on the New Order Coffee website. Chris Sabin promoted the blend, emphasizing the duo's desire to capture their energy and spirit within the beverage.

articles.title: Subaru's Latest Concepts Reintroduce the Brand's Most Beloved Nameplate
articles.author: Chris Chin
articles.summary: Subaru unveiled two STI concepts at the Japan Mobility, including the Performance-B STI Concept, based on a five-door Impreza with performance-oriented modifications.

articles.title: J&L Services Announces Major Expansion, Reinforcing Its Commitment to Quality and Community
articles.author: Maria Zsal
articles.summary: J&L Services is launching an expansion initiative that includes modern landscaping solutions, efficient lawn maintenance programs, and environmentally responsible snow and ice management. The company plans to introduce new equipment and sustainable service methods, such as advanced lawn maintenance systems, new mowers, electric tools, and regionally sourced materials.

articles.title: Upcoming Gemini Integration for Google Home Devices: The Complete Guide
articles.summary: Google is deploying its Gemini AI model to enhance its smart home product ecosystem. The initial rollout extends to a range of Google and Nest devices, offering streamlined interactions and personalized assistance. A more advanced version, Gemini Live, is available for Nest Hub Max and second-generation Nest Hub users with a Google Home Premium subscription, with future Google Home devices slated to have Gemini fully integrated.

articles.title: NHS doctor's multi-award-winning cream for mature skin 'takes just one use to work'
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Dr. Sam's introduced the Flawless Moisturiser Intense, designed for sensitive skin, which is clinically proven to repair the skin barrier. The product has received awards and positive reviews, highlighting its hydrating and soothing properties. The moisturizer contains Sunflower Sprout Extract, elevates NAD+ levels in the skin and helps strengthen skin's defences.

articles.title: Meet Neo, Your New Home Robot — There's Just One HUGE Problem… * 100PercentFedUp.com * by Noah
articles.summary: 1X Technologies (1x_tech) is pre-selling 'Neo,' a humanoid home robot slated to ship in 2026, priced at $20,000 or $499/month. Currently, Neo is remotely tele-operated, but the company states the released units will be fully autonomous and able to perform household chores.

articles.title: Pinnacli LLC Launches in California to Provide Specialized Digital Marketing for Luxury and Professional Services Brands
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Pinnacli LLC, a new digital marketing agency, has launched in California. The company offers AI-driven digital marketing strategies tailored for the luxury, high-end design, and professional services sectors, including Technical SEO Audits, Generative AI Search Optimization and AI-Driven Content Strategy. Pinnacli LLC's services are available in the US market, starting with their first domestic client, Breath Body Connection.

articles.title: Xsolla Enables U.S. Google Play Game Developers to Add External Purchase Links Inside Their Games
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Xsolla, a video game commerce company, now supports external purchases for Android developers in the United States. This capability follows Google's policy updates, expanding Xsolla's service to accommodate these changes.

articles.title: The Ninja SLUSHi Max Is $100 Off and Would Make an Excellent Gift
articles.author: Lauren Ro
articles.summary: SharkNinja has introduced the Ninja SLUSHi Max, a commercial-grade slushy maker miniaturized for home use. It can turn any drink into a slush in under 30 minutes without ice or blending. Currently, it's offered at $100 off with the code MAX100.

articles.title: LivePerson Founder's Personal Parenting Experience Inspires Creation of Voice-Powered Children's Creative Device
articles.summary: Robert LoCascio's Kid Company has launched the KID device, a voice-powered creative tool for children ages 4-14, priced at $299.99 with a $19.99 monthly subscription. The device uses AI to guide children in creating stories and engaging in educational activities, with curated content and a companion Parent Studio app for parental control. Initial shipments are guaranteed for the 2025 holiday season.

articles.title: Glovo committed to supporting SMEs to digitise and grow in Nigeria - Onafeko
articles.author: Osa Victor Obayagbona
articles.summary: Glovo has launched Glovo Academy, a learning and development initiative designed to provide in-person training and digital tools to businesses. Glovo also launched Glovo Prime, a subscription service where users can pay a monthly fee of N1,999 for unlimited free deliveries every month to improve affordability of food delivery for its users. Glovo Academy aims to optimise operations, boost brands, and increase online sales through the Glovo platform.

articles.title: Glovo committed to supporting SMEs to digitise and grow in Nigeria
articles.author: Osa Victor Obayagbona
articles.summary: Glovo launched Glovo Academy, which provides training and tools to help businesses optimize operations and increase online sales through the Glovo platform. Glovo also introduced Glovo Prime, a subscription service providing unlimited free deliveries for a monthly fee, enhancing affordability for users. Additionally, Glovo provides SMEs with data and tools to optimize their business operations, like inventory management and pricing strategies.

articles.title: NEO humanoid robot is available for preorder to help with tasks
articles.author: Niki Gunter
articles.summary: The NEO robot, priced at $20,000, is designed to assist with chores, learn from errors, and personalize interactions.

articles.title: How Lunacal became on of the fastest growing appointment scheduling software
articles.summary: Lunacal.ai has launched Lunacal, a new appointment scheduling tool designed to enhance the user experience and conversion rates. The tool allows users to customize their scheduling pages with testimonials, videos, and case studies, differentiating it from competitors by focusing on branding and conversion optimization. Lunacal integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, Zoom, and payment platforms.

articles.title: Shave.net Expands Available Safety Razor Options for Men Looking for a Classic Shave
articles.author: Seattle-Tacoma
articles.summary: Shave.net has expanded its safety razor collection, introducing a wider range of precision-engineered razors designed for traditional wet shaving. The new line includes adjustable and fixed-head safety razors made from stainless steel, brass, and zinc alloys, catering to both beginners and experienced shavers. Shave.net emphasizes sustainability by promoting reusable safety razors and recyclable blades as an alternative to disposable razors.

articles.title: How Lamborghini Reveals A New Model: Exclusive, Elite And Sold Out
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Lamborghini launched Fenomeno, its newest and most powerful supercar. This launch is also the forefront of the company's marketing efforts.

articles.title: What to know about NEO, the $20,000 humanoid robot that'll do your chores
articles.author: USA TODAY
articles.summary: 1X has launched NEO, a humanoid robot designed for household tasks, available for preorder at $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription. NEO features AI, advanced hardware, and self-charging capabilities. It can perform chores, act as an AI assistant, and will be delivered to homes in 2026.

articles.title: Q3 2025 Earnings Press Release (a3eb73) (Blackbaud Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Blackbaud launched a new AI innovation at its annual bbcon conference in Charleston, S.C. on October 29, 2025. The company states this innovation drives market leadership and competitive advantage.

articles.title: Mercedes-Benz CLA 250+ (2) The advantage of the Model 3 has finally faded, taking EV to the next phase
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has launched the CLA 250+ EQ Technology AMG Line Edition, a new electric vehicle with a claimed range of nearly 660km and a starting price of £49,375 in the UK. The CLA 250+ aims to redefine expectations for range and driving experience in the compact luxury EV segment and challenges competitors like the Tesla Model 3 Long Range.

articles.title: £15k humanoid robot cleaner Neo sparks privacy fears with ‘expert mode' feature
articles.author: Pop Culture
articles.summary: 1X Technologies has launched Neo, a £15,000 humanoid housekeeping robot, designed to handle domestic chores. Neo, controlled through a custom app, is available for pre-order with a £150 deposit before its official 2026 release.

articles.title: How Much is NEO Robot? Here's What 1x's New Humanoid Home Assistant Can Do
articles.author: Giuliano de Leon
articles.summary: 1X, a robotics company, launched the NEO robot on October 28, 2025, a humanoid designed for home automation. The NEO robot is available for preorder with a $200 deposit, with a one-time purchase of $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription, and is capable of performing chores and providing companionship. US deliveries are scheduled for 2026, with international markets following in 2027.

articles.title: I swear by my Dyson supersonic for fast drying – and it's on sale ahead of Black Friday 2025
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Dyson is offering discounts on its Supersonic and Supersonic Nural hair dryers. The Supersonic Nural, launched last year, features technology to protect the scalp and enhance hair health. The original Supersonic has also received upgrades with new attachments and design refinements, both models are currently discounted for Black Friday.

articles.title: TCL Super Drum C682: The intelligence revolution in laundry
articles.summary: TCL, a global leader in TV and air conditioner sales, is introducing its newest washing machine innovation, the TCL Super Drum C682. This washing machine features a bigger drum that delivers increased capacity and performance, fitting bulky items and delicate garments. The TCL Super Drum C682 will be available soon at authorized TCL dealers.

articles.title: Anker's soundcore R60i NC wireless earbuds now available in PHL
articles.author: CEDTy Clea
articles.summary: Anker Innovations' audio brand Soundcore has launched the R60i NC true wireless earbuds in the Philippines, priced at P1,795. The earbuds feature Hi-Res Audio certification, LDAC support, improved ANC, 40-50 hours of battery life, AI translation support, and a 6-mic AI Clear Call system.

articles.title: Hoover HW3 review: the clever wet and dry cordless vacuum that really works
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Hoover has introduced the HW3, a cordless vacuum and mop combination designed for effortless floor cleaning. The HW3 features a docking station for drying and charging, is lightweight at around 4kg, and is priced at £229 directly from Hoover, with potential discounts on Amazon. It offers decent vacuum performance and excels at cleaning tiles, handling spills, and is designed to clear a surface before wet treatment.

articles.title: Can smart glasses ever earn our trust?
articles.summary: Alibaba is launching its Quark AI glasses, featuring AI-powered translation displayed directly in the wearer's field of vision. Priced at approximately $560 after discounts, the glasses are positioned to be more affordable than upcoming smart glasses from Apple or Meta.

articles.title: Can smart glasses ever earn our trust? 智能眼镜能否赢得我们的信任？
articles.author: 英国 金融时报
articles.summary: Alibaba is offering a new experience with its AI-powered smart glasses that translates foreign languages in real-time. The Chinese tech group aims to make smart glasses practical and affordable.

articles.title: Philadelphia Launches Virtual Inspections App, Ushering in a New Era of Building Safety and Service Delivery (City of Philadelphia, PA)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: The City of Philadelphia launched its Virtual service on October 22, 2025. This new technology is expected to improve customer experience, enhance safety, and increase efficiency.

articles.title: Cordless vacuum that 'picks up dust and hair effortlessly' gets £50 cut in limited time deal
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon offers a limited-time deal on the AlloyMove Cordless Vacuum Cleaner, priced at £109.99. This vacuum features a brushless motor, 45Kpa suction, and a 60-minute run time. The article also mentions SMOTURE Cordless Vacuum Cleaner and Vax Blade 4 Classic Cordless Vacuum Cleaner as alternatives.

articles.title: Dunnes Stores fans set to love pretty new bow dress for autumn/winter & it costs just €30
articles.summary: Dunnes Stores has released the new Savida Bow Mini Dress, priced at €30 and available in sizes XXS to XXL. Additionally, their popular Christmas pyjamas, made from 100% cotton and priced at €25, have been styled as outerwear and are currently sold out online.

articles.title: OnePlus confirms the OnePlus 15 will go global on November 13
articles.author: Craig Donaldson
articles.summary: OnePlus will globally launch the OnePlus 15 on November 13, revealing details about its price, specs, and availability during a YouTube launch event. The phone features a new design with a square camera island and is powered by Qualcomm's Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset, offering enhanced photography through OnePlus' DetailMax Engine. A $50 discount is offered in the US and Canada for subscribers who sign up for updates.

articles.title: American consumers first to get real-life home helper in NEO humanoid robot & can preorder one now to ‘redefine life'
articles.author: Arshi Qureshi
articles.summary: 1X has launched preorders for NEO, a humanoid robot designed for household chores and personalized assistance, with the first units shipping in 2026. NEO can perform tasks like laundry, tidying, and fetching items, and can be remotely guided to learn new skills. The robot also features conversational AI, object recognition, and memory for long-term tasks.

articles.title: Worth a mention: Seattle tech vets launch Alertmouse, a startup to track who's talking about you
articles.author: Kurt Schlosser
articles.summary: Alertmouse, a new Seattle startup created by Rand Fishkin, Adam Doppelt, and Nathan Kriege, launched a new monitoring tool that generates email alerts for online mentions. Alertmouse offers tiered pricing plans, including a free option, and aims to provide a better service than Google Alerts. The service attracted 1,000 sign-ups shortly after its launch.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 with Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 set for debut in India next month
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: OnePlus India is teasing the launch of a new Sand Storm variant of its OnePlus 15 smartphone.

articles.title: Massive ALDI Discount Grocery Store Coming To Downtown Brooklyn
articles.author: Vianella Burns
articles.summary: Aldi is opening a new supermarket in Downtown Brooklyn next week, located inside the 625 Fulton development. The opening festivities include a ribbon-cutting ceremony on Nov. 6, with the first 100 shoppers receiving a Golden Ticket and free ALDI products. ALDI is also preparing to open its first central Manhattan location in 2026 inside The Ellery.

articles.title: Why the new Dyson V16 Piston Animal isn't the vacuum you should buy
articles.author: Andy Shaw
articles.summary: Dyson has introduced the V16 Piston Animal vacuum cleaner, featuring a new 'All Floors Cones Sense' floor head designed for both carpet and hard floors. The launch price is £749.99, but the arrival of the V16 has pushed down prices of predecessors, such as the V15 and Gen5detect. While the V16 boasts a larger dustbin and longer battery life, its cleaning performance did not surpass older Dyson models.

articles.title: Barnes and Noble to open new store in Glenwood Springs
articles.author: Post Independent
articles.summary: Barnes & Noble is opening a new bookstore in Glenwood Springs on November 5th. The store will offer books, games, toys, magazines, and a B&N Café. Grand opening deals include discounts on NOOk devices and movies, and double stamps for Barnes & Noble Premium and Rewards members.

articles.title: Admiral Expands to Nigeria, Introducing 90 Years of American Home Innovation and Effortless Living Appliances.
articles.author: Pulse Mix
articles.summary: Admiral, in partnership with DeeKay Group, is launching a range of home appliances in Nigeria, including washing machines, freezers, televisions, fans, gas cookers and refrigerators. The company promises power-saving products engineered in the U.S. and refined for the Nigerian market, with more product innovations planned. These products are already available in leading retail stores nationwide.

articles.title: Parcel Perform Defines 'GEO' for E-Commerce with Launch of AI Commerce Visibility
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Parcel Perform launched the enterprise beta of "AI Commerce Visibility", a solution designed for e-commerce businesses. This new service helps companies monitor, analyze and improve their visibility across AI shopping platforms like ChatGPT, Perplexity, and Gemini. It aims to address the shift to AI-driven discovery, enabling brands to optimize their presence and performance in AI-driven commerce.

articles.title: Wix Partners with PayPal Becoming Strategic Partner for PayPal's New Agentic Commerce Solution
articles.author: Wix.com
articles.summary: Wix merchants are set to utilize PayPal's agentic commerce services for AI-powered product discovery and checkout. This integration will occur on leading AI shopping platforms.

articles.title: Circus successfully launches its autonomous AI robotics system CA-1 in REWE supermarkets
articles.summary: Circus SE and REWE Region West have launched 'Fresh & Smart', a new service powered by Circus' CA-1 AI robotics system. The first location in Düsseldorf Heerdt features AI-powered autonomous cooking robots inside a supermarket, offering freshly prepared meals.

articles.title: Paytronix Releases Journey Builder to Enable Self-Service, Ultra-Personalized Messaging Campaigns
articles.author: Paytronix Systems Inc.
articles.summary: Paytronix, an Access company, launched Journey Builder, an AI-powered campaign automation tool designed for marketers to create multi-touchpoint guest journeys. This release is the first in Paytronix's enhanced Guest Engagement Suite, a unified platform that helps restaurants and convenience stores build lasting relationships. Journey Builder integrates seamlessly with Paytronix's segmentation capabilities, enabling marketers to target the right guests at the right time.

articles.title: Australian cities are awash with luxury laundromats: ‘They're popping up left, right and centre'
articles.author: Isabella Lee
articles.summary: Aqualogic Water Systems, a commercial laundry equipment distributor, has seen a significant increase in self-service laundromats. The Tumble Club, founded in 2020, has expanded to over 20 locations, indicating a growing trend towards modern laundromats offering convenient and aesthetically pleasing services.

articles.title: Amazon Echo Studio vs. Echo Dot Max: Which Should You Buy?
articles.summary: Amazon is launching new smart speakers starting at $100. Hands-on reviews are available to assess the incentive for customers to upgrade.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Oct 29, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Eggo and Netflix introduced Stranger Things Strawberry Waffles. Dove released limited-edition Fall Treats Body Wash. Shark launched the Freestyle Max Cordless Upright Vacuum. Uncrustables unveiled Bright-Eyed Berry and Up & Apple sandwiches. Neutrogena launched Hair Restore Advanced Growth Scalp Serum. SheaMoisture released Vitamin C + Niacinamide Even Tone Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Revlon launched One-Step Multi-Styler. Sara Lee is expanding its Half Loaf line with Whole Wheat, Sourdough, and Hawaiian flavors. Chef Merito launched limited edition Carne and Pollo seasoning bottles and News Zealand launched Grass-Fed Lamb Recipe for Dogs.

articles.title: Novelty by Boomtown to close Nov. 2. What's next for sammies, nachos?
articles.author: The Oklahoman
articles.summary: Novelty, a sister concept of Boomtown Creamery, closed on November 2 due to insufficient sales. Boomtown Creamery will integrate some of Novelty's unique and creative ice cream product ideas into its own offerings.

articles.title: Nusign Global Launch Event Concludes Successfully, Embarking on a New International Chapter
articles.summary: Nusign, a brand under Deli Group, held a global launch event in Ninghai, Zhejiang, introducing a new product matrix featuring series like 'Master Series', 'Sunshine Whisper', 'Natural Fluid', 'Classic Series', and 'PUZZLE Series'. These new product lines are designed for learning, work, and home life, marking Nusign's official debut in the global market.

articles.title: Smart geysers explained: What are they and how are they different from traditional ones
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Smart water heaters are a new product that offers features beyond basic heating. They can be controlled remotely via a smartphone app, allowing users to schedule water heating, customize temperature settings, and monitor energy consumption. These geysers provide benefits like energy management, temperature control, extra safety features, and remote control functionality.

articles.title: ChatGPT Go
articles.summary: Nubank announced an unprecedented benefit for its customers starting today.

articles.title: External SSD buying guide: How to pick the right storage for backup and travel
articles.author: Iqbal
articles.summary: Samsung's T7 Shield is highlighted for speed and ruggedness, SanDisk's Extreme Portable SSD offers water and dust resistance (IP65 rating) in a compact size, and Crucial's X9 Pro is noted for balancing affordability and reliability. These SSDs cater to diverse needs from professionals requiring robust storage to everyday users seeking dependable performance and portability.

articles.title: OnePlus announces new flagship smartphone OnePlus 15 arriving two months early
articles.summary: OnePlus 15 will make its global debut on November 13, 2025, featuring the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 platform and OxygenOS 16. It has a new Hasselblad-free camera system and comes in three colors, and OnePlus is collaborating with DJI, offering Osmo Mobile 7.  Users who pay a deposit to reserve their OnePlus 15 will get discounts, which can be combined with other offers including a DJI Osmo Mobile 7 Gimbal (while stocks last).

articles.title: Humanoid household robot Neo: advance sales start
articles.summary: 1X Robotics has opened pre-orders for 'Neo,' a humanoid robot designed for household tasks, deliveries are expected to begin in 2026. The robot can understand voice commands, recognize objects, and learn new skills via a 'Chores app', and subscription to remote expert guidance is available.

articles.title: Amazon is selling a $500 vacuum for $129 right now — here's what makes it stand out
articles.author: Melina Brum
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner at 74% off. The vacuum features powerful suction, a swappable battery for up to 55 minutes of runtime, an anti-tangle brush, dual HEPA filters, and an LED flex head.  Users praise its build quality and lightweight design, though some note it works best on hard floors.

articles.title: Wizz Air To Trial ‘Wizz Class' Premium Product From December
articles.author: Helen Massy-Beresford
articles.summary: Wizz Air will launch 'Wizz Class,' a new premium product, on select routes starting in December. This offering is designed to cater to business travelers seeking more onboard space.

articles.title: 亲们，Macy 这个降价的吸尘机能买吗？
articles.summary: Roborock robot vacuum cleaners, which feature vacuuming, mopping, and self-maintenance functions, are recommended. Potential discounts on Roborock are expected at Costco and Amazon during Black Friday.

articles.title: Romanian PR Award 2025 își prezintă campaniile nominalizate
articles.author: Comunicat De Presă
articles.summary: Samsung Romania launched Galaxy Z Fold7 & Flip7 at Beach, Please. Freshful by eMAG launched Verde cu Freshful. FactoryLab & Raiffeisen Bank launched the smallest showroom in the World.

articles.title: Nothing Phone (3a) Lite has Facebook & Instagram services that can't be uninstalled
articles.summary: Nothing has launched its first phone with third-party bloatware, the Nothing Phone (3a) Lite. This new phone is shipping out of the box.

articles.title: Fake Pregnancy Pranks Spark 75,000 Sales Creating a Million Dollar Trend
articles.summary: Baby Maybe, a company specializing in fake ultrasound and pregnancy test products, has sold over 75,000 orders across the globe. They offer various products, including physical replicas, digital templates, and a free fake ultrasound generator used for entertainment, content creation, and personal use.

articles.title: ACTIVE Launches Singular: A Cannabis Vape Platform Designed for Every Extract
articles.summary: ACTIVE has launched Singular, a new modular vape platform for cannabis extracts, designed for sustainability and performance. The platform is launching with Verano Holdings Corp. and Trulieve Cannabis Corp., and will be available in over 1,000 dispensaries.

articles.title: Golden Impressions (GI) Launches New Tech and AI Marketing Website
articles.author: Golden Impressions
articles.summary: Golden Impressions (GI), a creative agency, has launched its new website, www.goldenimpressions.com, showcasing its marketing solutions, work portfolio, and customer successes. The website details GI's offerings including Fractional CMO, Sales Management, and CFO services aimed at helping companies gain a foothold in the US or global marketplace.

articles.title: Wayfair is offering a major discount on the Simzlife Nugget Ice Maker
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Wayfair is offering the Simzlife Countertop Nugget Ice Maker for $189.49, reduced from $399.99, as part of their Way Day event. The ice maker produces up to 45 pounds of nugget ice daily and has a stainless steel design.

articles.title: The 'sweetest cleaners' will meet you where you're at: Lemon Fresh Cleaners
articles.summary: Lemon Fresh Cleaners, owned by Gabby Gile, launched its cleaning services in Grand Rapids in the spring of 2024. The company's owners moved to town two years prior to start the new venture.

articles.title: New Generation Consumer Group's Signature Apps in Talks to Acquire Revenue-Generating Subscription App Companies
articles.summary: Signature Apps is actively pursuing acquisitions of subscription-based app and service companies to expand its digital product suite and customer base. These acquisitions are intended to strengthen Signature Apps' recurring revenue and accelerate cash flow growth. The target companies provide complementary services that integrate into Signature Apps' platform.

articles.title: NexTide Media to Launch the First Real-Time Brand Safety Platform Built for Livestreaming with LiveGuard™
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NexTide Media is launching LiveGuard™, an AI-powered brand safety platform for livestreaming, in mid-November. LiveGuard™ operates across platforms like Twitch and YouTube Live, providing real-time moderation and brand safety measures for advertisers. The platform offers a three-layer system to ensure ads appear in brand-approved, contextually safe environments.

articles.title: NexTide Media to Launch the First Real-Time Brand Safety Platform Built for Livestreaming with LiveGuard™
articles.author: Nex Tide
articles.summary: NexTide Media announced the launch of LiveGuard™, a patent-pending, AI-powered brand safety platform designed for live content. The platform is platform-agnostic and operates across streams on livestreaming services like Twitch, YouTube Live, and Kick. LiveGuard™ will be available in mid-November.

articles.title: You Can Own Your Very Own Robot
articles.summary: Neo, a personal robot, is now available for purchase at a price of $20,000.

articles.title: New Generation Consumer Group's Signature Apps in Talks to Acquire Revenue-Generating Subscription App Companies
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: New Generation Consumer Group's subsidiary, Signature Apps, is in discussions to acquire multiple app and service companies. These target companies utilize subscription-based models. This acquisition strategy will scale Signature Apps' digital product suite and grow its customer base.

articles.title: Google showing off smart glasses that ‘MILLIONS of people' will use to see virtual computer world on top of real life
articles.author: Sean Keach
articles.summary: Google is showcasing prototype smart glasses developed in partnership with Magic Leap, designed to overlay virtual information on the real world. These glasses aim to balance visual quality, comfort, and manufacturability, utilizing Magic Leap's optical hardware and Google's Raxium microLED light engine. Meta has also released Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses with built-in display.

articles.title: Zscaler Announces New Innovations for Advanced End-to-End Monitoring, Diagnostics, and Remediation
articles.summary: Zscaler has introduced new innovations to its Zscaler Digital Experience™ (ZDX™) platform. These enhancements are designed to help enterprises monitor and resolve performance issues more efficiently by providing real-time insights across the internet and endpoints. The new ZDX innovations aim to improve user experience and productivity by significantly reducing issue detection time and resolution time.

articles.title: Magic Leap and Google present prototype of AI glasses to boost the Android XR ecosystem
articles.summary: Google and Magic Leap have jointly unveiled a prototype of AI-powered AR glasses. The prototype serves as a foundational reference design for the Android XR ecosystem. The glasses blend digital content with the real world using multimodal AI, offering an intuitive and immersive experience with various applications, from education to entertainment.

articles.title: Discounted electric cleaning brush ‘makes cleaning feel seamless'
articles.author: editorial@examiner.co.uk
articles.summary: The Leebein Electric Spin Scrubber is available on Amazon for £29.98, reduced from £38.99. This rechargeable, cordless scrubber comes with eight replaceable brush heads, an extendable handle, and two spin speeds. Customer reviews indicate it is effective for cleaning various surfaces like tile, grout, wood floors, and windows.

articles.title: NEXE Innovations Reports Repeat and New Orders: ~250K Repeat Order and 100K New West Coast Roaster Deal
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Nexe Innovations anticipates the potential development and launch of additional SKUs. The company also expresses belief in continued market interest based on recent orders and expects future engagement with new partners.

articles.title: I Had Given Up on Dry Shampoo — Until I Tried K18's
articles.author: Dominique Pariso
articles.summary: K18 has launched a new dry shampoo called AirWash. The product is described as a 'wash day in a can', effectively cleaning and styling hair while leaving the scalp feeling clean. Unlike other dry shampoos, it doesn't leave a white cast or create buildup, and it can even absorb sweat after a workout.

articles.title: Shop TODAY Ranked: Editor-tested and Approved Solutions for Every Space of Your Home
articles.author: Sierra Hoeger
articles.summary: Shop TODAY editors tested and reviewed various products, naming some of them as "best overall". These include: Cosori TurboBlaze air fryer with multiple functions, Bissell PowerFresh Slim Steam Mop known for quick heating, iRobot H1 handheld vacuum with attachments, a countertop ice maker with ice bag feature, a smart trash can with self-sealing bags, and Arm & Hammer shoe deodorizers. The products are independently chosen and sold by retailers.

articles.title: Dyson's ridiculously overpriced robot vacuum finally gets a shock £550 price cut
articles.author: Kieran Ahuja
articles.summary: Dyson has announced a significant £550 discount on its 360 Vis Nav robot vacuum cleaner. This price cut aims to make the Dyson, known for its powerful suction, more competitive with other mid-range robot vacuum cleaners like the Roomba Max 705 and the Dreame L40s.

articles.title: Microsoft rolls out redesigned Start Menu for Windows 11 with new features
articles.author: Amit Rahi
articles.summary: Microsoft has started rolling out a redesigned Start menu for Windows 11 as part of the October 2025 non-security update. The new Start menu features a dynamic layout with category and alphabetical views, allowing users to customize their app lists and hide sections. The update also includes visual improvements to the taskbar and an upgraded Phone Link panel.

articles.title: I tried the robot that's coming to live with you. It's still part human.
articles.author: Joanna Stern
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is launching its humanoid robot, Neo, designed for household chores. The robot will be available through an early adopter program with preorders starting at $20,000 or a $499 monthly rental plan with a six-month minimum. Delivery is expected in 2026, with initial versions relying on teleoperation before becoming fully autonomous.

articles.title: NuORDER by Lightspeed Extends Partnership with Nordstrom as Retailer Invests in Data-Driven Wholesale Strategies
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Nordstrom is strengthening its partnership with NuORDER by Lightspeed, utilizing the platform to improve its merchandise assortment and customer experience. NuORDER will play a larger role in Nordstrom's data integration program. NuORDER will increase data capture to support AI-driven forecasting, product recommendations, and personalization.

articles.title: ⚡ChatGPT's Dominance at the Slippery Slope: OpenAI Directly Tackles the Complexities Ahead
articles.summary: OpenAI is preparing to allow adults to create erotic content in ChatGPT, marking a shift from its historical prevention of explicit content generation. This move could potentially commodify emotional experiences, turning them into revenue streams.

articles.title: 26 Cleaning Products That Simply Banish Mess
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Bissell launched the Little Green upholstery cleaner for cleaning couches and carpets. The Pink Stuff introduced an internet-famous cleaning paste for cleaning pans, oven, sink, tiles, shower, and walls. Wet & Forget introduced shower cleaner for removing mucky buildup in their tub.

articles.title: Samsung Finally Unveils Galaxy TriFold And Confirms Release Date
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch a new model in its Galaxy Z series of folding phones, featuring a unique three-screen design with inward-folding hinges. The device is expected to have a 6.5-inch display when folded and a 10-inch display when unfolded, with a thickness of 4.2mm when unfolded and 1.2-1.5cm when folded. Samsung plans to release the new device within the year.

articles.title: LG Expands AI Ecosystem: From Smart TVs to Connected Home Experiences
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria introduced its new range of AI-powered Smart TVs (OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD) at the LG Smart TV AI Press Conference. LG also partnered with Ecobank Nigeria to launch an Easy Monthly Installment (EMI) Scheme for purchasing LG Smart TVs and other home appliances. Furthermore, LG received awards for the LG SIGNATURE OLED T, the world's first wireless transparent TV.

articles.title: A Century of Aromas: Exploring 1,000 Years of German Fragrance Through Art and History
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Johann Maria Farina launched Eau de cologne in 1709, a pivotal moment in German perfume history. In 1796, 4711 Eau de Cologne was created. Memo Paris launched Odeon.

articles.title: Samsung unveils first tri-fold smartphone at APEC K-Tech Showcase
articles.author: 생활스포츠지도사 라이프가드
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics introduced the 'Galaxy Z Tri-Fold' smartphone, featuring a dual-fold design that expands into a screen larger than 10 inches. LG Electronics showcased its Signature OLED T, the world's first wireless and transparent TV, configured as a large chandelier installation.

articles.title: Neo Humanoid Robot Unveiled — but Would You Let a $20,000 Machine Cook, Clean and Watch You 24/7?
articles.author: Marie Joy Toledo
articles.summary: 1X Technologies has unveiled Neo, a consumer-ready humanoid robot designed for domestic chores. Neo is priced at $20,000 and is available for pre-order in the United States, with shipments expected to begin in 2026. The robot is marketed as a premium home assistant with features like object recognition, home navigation, and voice command interaction.

articles.title: Cashify unveils AI-powered campaign, showcasing the future of refurbished technology
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: Cashify has launched an AI-led campaign called 'Welcome to Refurbia' to promote its refurbished devices. The campaign aims to educate audiences about refurbished technology and highlight how Cashify gives devices a second life, reducing environmental impact.

articles.title: Kakao adds ChatGPT to KakaoTalk after update backlash
articles.author: 튜터 K의 한국어 튜터링
org: Ministry of the Interior and Safety
articles.summary: Kakao has launched 'ChatGPT for Kakao,' an AI assistant integrated into KakaoTalk, connecting to core services like KakaoMap and Kakao Gift. This service allows users to access ChatGPT directly within KakaoTalk, offering context-aware automated responses and seamless integration with Kakao's ecosystem, including image generation and AI-driven tasks. Kakao plans to expand this integration to other services like finance, mobility, and entertainment.

articles.title: IPO news: What does the Offer for Sale, Fresh Issue mean in the primary market?
articles.author: Dhanya Nagasundaram
articles.summary: Orkla India's IPO consists entirely of an Offer For Sale (OFS) component. Lenskart Solutions' IPO includes an OFS portion of ₹ 5,128.02 crore alongside a fresh issue of ₹ 2,150 crore. The Studds Accessories IPO is entirely OFS and set to open soon.

articles.title: No time to shower? No problem. This dry shampoo actually works - I put Color Wow Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo to the test
articles.author: EMILY KNOTT
articles.summary: Color Wow launched Insta-WOW Advanced Dry Shampoo, a new dry shampoo utilizing 'cleansing technology' with coco-glucoside to remove oil and impurities from hair. Unlike conventional dry shampoos, Insta-WOW aims to provide a 'shampoo-grade clean' and has received positive reviews for its effectiveness.

articles.title: CelcomDigi Unveils Spark – A Malaysia's First eSIM-Only, App-Powered Mobile Experience
articles.author: Press Releases
articles.summary: CelcomDigi Berhad has launched Spark, a new digital-first mobile experience with eSIM-only and app-powered features. Spark offers users the flexibility to manage their mobile subscriptions and features three plans starting from RM15/month with up to 200GB of internet. Users who activate Spark by December 31, 2025, will receive RM5 off every month for 12 months.

articles.title: Neat Sunday Launches Innovative Tech-Driven Self-Care Products
articles.summary: Neat Sunday introduces tech-driven self-care products including a Wireless Ultrasonic Retainer Cleaner, Heated Eye Mask, and Ionic Hair Dryer. These products combine design and technology to simplify wellness rituals, making them accessible and enjoyable. The brand aims to integrate calm and relaxation into daily routines.

articles.title: Outdoor play has a lot to offer; don't let a few stains stop you and your kids
articles.author: angelago
articles.summary: Breeze is promoting outdoor play for children with the Breeze LarOlympics campaign. Breeze Advanced Powder offers cleaning and whitening, while Breeze Advanced Liquid removes dried-in stains and leaves clothes fresh, making them suitable for parents dealing with post-play cleanup.

articles.title: Ultrasonic travel washing machine: the USB gadget for washing on the go
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: The Ultrasonic Travel Washing Machine is introduced as a portable cleaning solution powered by USB, suitable for travel and small loads of laundry or crockery. Raylo Business offers iPhone 17 leasing options starting from £19.66 a month, providing an accessible way to acquire the latest iPhone models.

articles.title: Save 60% off this USB washing machine you can fit in a backpack
articles.author: Gareth Butterfield
articles.summary: Simplify Living is offering the Ultrasonic Travel Washing Machine with a 60% discount as part of its early Black Friday sale. Raylo Business is introducing iPhone 17 range leasing, starting from £19.66 a month with no upfront fees, including the standard iPhone 17, the ultra-slim iPhone 17 Air, the powerful Pro and the top-tier Pro Max.

articles.title: Meet Neo, the $20,000 humanoid robot that can clean your house and spy on you too
articles.summary: 1X Technologies has announced Neo, a $20,000 humanoid robot designed for household chores and personal assistance. Neo features a patented Tendon Drive system for safe interaction and is equipped with AI for conversational interaction and visual interpretation of its surroundings. Pre-orders are available with early access units costing $20,000 or a $499 monthly subscription, with initial deliveries planned for the US in 2026.

articles.title: Chobani's CEO says he slept in the company's factories for the first 5 years of the business
articles.summary: Xiaomi's CEO, Lei Jun, announced that 100,000 units of the Xiaomi SU7 have been achieved. This milestone was celebrated in a post, marking a significant achievement for the new product.

articles.title: Meet NEO, the $20K humanoid that cooks, carries groceries and talks to you
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: 1X Technologies is set to launch NEO, a $20,000 humanoid robot designed to assist with household tasks. NEO boasts features like advanced connectivity, voice command programming, and the ability to perform various chores, with early access planned for the US market in 2026 and a broader rollout in 2027, a subscription model is also available for $499 monthly.

articles.title: If Your Love Language Is Gift Giving, Surprise Someone With One Of These 27 Gifts At Random
articles.author: Mallory Mower
articles.summary: Caraway introduces a 12-piece cookware set featuring nonstick cookware with minimalist silhouettes compatible with induction, gas, and electric stove tops, oven-safe up to 550 degrees Fahrenheit, and made with a nontoxic coating. Andrew Chau and Bin Chen release "The Boba Book: Bubble Tea and Beyond", a collection of imaginative boba recipes allowing readers to create unique bubble tea drinks.

articles.title: 1X's Neo humanoid robot redefines future of smart living: Watch
articles.author: The News Digital
articles.summary: Robotic firm 1X is launching Neo, the world's first consumer-ready humanoid robot, designed to automate household chores and offer personal assistance. Available from next year, Neo can organize shelves, fold laundry, manage dishes, and be controlled via button click or verbal command. Customers who pre-order Neo will agree to a contract where a 1X operator will remotely guide the robot using its camera.

articles.title: Google and Magic Leap are showing off prototype AI glasses.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Google and Magic Leap are showcasing a prototype of new AI glasses. These glasses integrate Magic Leap's waveguides and optics with Google's Raxium microLED light engine, featuring a lightweight monocular design weighing under 50 grams. Magic Leap is also positioning itself as an AR ecosystem partner.

articles.title: Pioneering Care: Novel Tissues Redefines Hygiene Manufacturing
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Novel Tissues Pvt. Ltd. launched REMOCON, a radiological decontamination skin wipe designed for public health and safety in both defence and civilian sectors. This product is a result of the company's focus on leveraging cutting-edge technology.

articles.title: Google's Android app is already getting prepared for Samsung's ‘tri-fold' phone
articles.author: Bharat Sharma
articles.summary: Samsung is reportedly developing a '2025 Samsung Trifold' smartphone featuring a tri-fold design. The device may integrate with Google's Gemini AI and offer seamless transitions between compact, widescreen, and tablet modes, enhancing streaming, gaming, and productivity. A launch might be on the horizon for 2025.

articles.title: Lexus Unveils Six-Wheeled LS Concept at Japan Mobility Show 2025
articles.summary: Lexus unveiled the LS Concept, a six-wheeled 'Luxury Space' minivan, at the 2025 Japan Mobility Show. The futuristic EV features three rows, panoramic glass roofs, and ultra-luxury interiors, redefining the LS name from 'Luxury Sedan' to 'Luxury Space.' Lexus aims to revolutionize comfort and design with this concept vehicle.

articles.title: BPO giant TP opens new Taguig facility to hire thousands more
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Teleperformance (TP), formerly Teleperformance, has opened its 27th and most advanced site.

articles.title: Cashify Launches Its First-Ever AI-Led Campaign, ‘Welcome to Refurbia'
articles.summary: Cashify, an Indian re-commerce platform, has launched 'Welcome to Refurbia', an AI-led marketing campaign designed to promote refurbished devices. The campaign visualizes a universe where pre-owned devices get a second chance, aiming to educate audiences and build trust in refurbished technology while highlighting Cashify's commitment to sustainability.

articles.title: Former Big Tech leaders launch TheFifth.AI in India to bridge strategy execution gap
articles.author: Best Media Info Bureau 29
articles.summary: TheFifth.AI, a new marketing transformation and consumer consulting firm, has launched. It aims to bridge the gap between strategy and execution for consumer brands by combining growth strategy, brand and customer experience development, and cost optimisation using AI-led systems.

articles.title: Samsung to unveil first tri-fold smartphone at APEC summit
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch its first tri-fold smartphone at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation summit. The device features a 6.5-inch outer screen and a 10-inch interior display, potentially powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset and a 200-megapixel main camera. Initial output is expected to be limited, with the device aimed at reinforcing Samsung's technological leadership rather than mass-market volume.

articles.title: NCS Receives Frost & Sullivan's 2025 Singapore Customer Value Leadership Recognition in the Contact Center Technology Services Industry
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: NCS launched an integrated generative AI solution built on Amazon Bedrock and orchestrated through its Ins8.ai platform, combining speech recognition and intelligent call summarization for the Ministry of Manpower Singapore's Contact Centre. This resulted in a 10% reduction in average handling time and a >50% reduction in after-call administrative work, showcasing the use of generative AI to augment human agents.

articles.title: Lady Kitty Spencer, la nièce de Lady Diana, est littéralement une fille en or
articles.author: Laura Scafati
articles.summary: An apparel company is launching a new line of high-end baby clothes. The company collaborates with an agency to create profiles of wealthy young parents and couples to target them with advertising within partner apps. This targeted approach aims to promote the new product line to the most relevant consumer base.

articles.title: How "world's supermarket" in east China expands trade via AI, IP
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center, a sixth-generation market, opened with integrated digital infrastructure, enabling merchants to use AI and technology for product design, marketing, and international trade. Companies like Zhejiang Boran Education Technology Co., Ltd. are developing new products in children's education sector leveraging AI. Coco Nepalese wool felt store is planning launch of wool felting DIY experience courses.

articles.title: Swept Dating Launches as the First Dating App That Fights Ghosting, Catfishing, and Shallow Matches
articles.summary: Swept Dating, a new dating app developed by a former Amazon manager, has launched with the goal of making online dating more human. The app utilizes AI and behavioral insights to address issues like ghosting and catfishing, offering features such as an anti-ghosting system, optional ID verification, and compatibility matching based on personality analysis. Swept Dating is available on iOS and Android.

articles.title: Al Masaood Automobiles Delivers an Adrenaline-Fueled Nissan Z Experience at Yas Marina Circuit
articles.summary: Al Masaood Automobiles, the authorized distributor of Nissan, showcased the Nissan Z at Yas Marina Circuit, offering guests an on-track experience with the 400HP twin-turbo V6 engine. Al Masaood Automobiles offers the Nissan Z from AED 2,435 per month, including a 5-year warranty and 5-year roadside assistance.

articles.title: 35 Cute Products You'll Use All The Time
articles.author: Karly Jacklin
articles.summary: Death Wish introduces instant coffee packets containing 300 mg of caffeine, targeting consumers seeking a strong coffee. Additionally, new open-ear headphones "float" above the ear, allowing the user to be aware of their surroundings while listening to music or podcasts. Finally, a glowing rain cloud essential oil diffuser provides personalized relaxation with adjustable light and waterflow settings.

articles.title: Nashville Full Service Advertising Agency Specializing in Content Writing Services
articles.summary: A Nashville advertising agency offers content writing services, encompassing website copywriting, blog post writing, article writing, social media content creation, email marketing content creation, and video scriptwriting. These services aim to enhance SEO, generate leads, build brands, and increase engagement for businesses.

articles.title: TV brand SHARP gets into the EV game with this living room on wheels
articles.author: Jo Borrás
articles.summary: SHARP is introducing the LDK+ concept, a vehicle that transforms into a mobile movie theater and integrates living room, dining room, and kitchen functionalities. Based on Foxconn's 'Model A EV', this compact minivan model offers an expansive cabin layout that includes a projector, reclining seats, and connectivity to home appliances via SHARP's AIoT platform.

articles.title: Newoff, a second-hand clothing purchase service that allows you to easily and quickly sell clothes y..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: Newoff has launched a second-hand clothing commerce platform that allows users to both sell and purchase used clothes. The platform focuses on quality control through inspection, sterilization, and washing, offering a reliable alternative to personal transactions. They also provide free shipping and return services to the buyers.

articles.title: iPhone 16: No Buttons? Apple's Radical Design Shift
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly aiming to launch a buttonless iPhone in 2027, featuring solid-state buttons with haptic feedback.  This move would eliminate physical buttons and rely on tactile sensations to simulate the feeling of physical controls. The success hinges on Apple's haptic feedback and the challenges include adapting muscle memory and addressing accessibility concerns.

articles.title: OPPO Unveils the Find X9 Series Globally, Redefining the Premium Smartphone Experience
articles.summary: OPPO is set to launch the Find X9 Series, targeting the new generation of global users with enhanced imaging, AI, battery, and connectivity features. The Find X9 Pro includes a 200MP Hasselblad Telephoto camera and AI Portrait Glow, reflecting OPPO's commitment to empowering creators and advancing mobile imaging. OPPO is also reimagining its retail experience with immersive displays and strengthening its e-commerce presence on platforms like TikTok.

articles.title: Toyota Corolla Concept Takes the Bestseller to Another Level and Offers a Powertrain for Everyone
articles.summary: Toyota unveiled the Toyota Corolla Concept at the Japan Mobility Show 2025. This concept car previews the next generation of the Toyota Corolla. Toyota aims to maintain its global benchmark with a multi-energy strategy.

articles.title: Sedan no more! Lexus LS concepts revealed as six-wheel people mover, coupe SUV
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Lexus is applying the LS name to two designs, signaling a new direction for both the nameplate and the brand. The LS flagship model will spearhead this initiative.

articles.title: This $20 gadget will completely change how you use Alexa at home
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new Amazon Basics device designed for use in a smart home environment. The device's functionality is suggested to work within the Amazon smart home ecosystem.

articles.title: Dyson Week deal: Beloved $590 V8 Absolute vaccum got sucked down to just $299
articles.author: Ashley Palya
articles.summary: Dyson is offering a significant price reduction on its V8 Absolute vacuum cleaner, cutting the price from $590 to $299 for Dyson Week. The Dyson V8 Absolute is a cordless stick vacuum featuring powerful suction, HEPA filtration, and specialized cleaner heads for different floor types.

articles.title: TCL adds power and precision in washing with the Super Drum C682
articles.author: Mb Technews
articles.summary: TCL has launched the TCL Super Drum C682 washing machine. The new washing machine has features like an extra-large drum, automatic stain removal, precise dosing, WiFi control, and steam cleaning. It comes in white and gray color variants.

articles.title: LG, Ecobank partner to drive smart living accessibility in Nigeria
articles.author: Anthony
articles.summary: LG Electronics Nigeria launched a new line of AI Smart TVs with features personalizing viewing experiences. Ecobank Nigeria has partnered with LG to provide financing options to make these AI-powered TVs more accessible to Nigerians. The new AI TV lineup includes OLED, QNED, NanoCell, and UHD models.

articles.title: Best Long-lasting Liquid Lipsticks to Elevate Your Diwali look on Myntra.
articles.author: Zee Media Bureau
articles.summary: Myntra is featuring new liquid lipsticks from Lakme (Forever Matte Lightweight), L'Oréal Paris (Infallible Matte Resistance), CROWN Beauty (Beauty Of Nature), and Maybelline New York (Superstay Matte). Each lipstick offers unique features such as long-lasting wear, matte finishes, and specific color pigments, designed to meet various makeup preferences and occasions.

articles.title: Economic Watch: How "world's supermarket" in east China expands trade via AI, IP
articles.author: Source: Xinhua
articles.summary: The Yiwu Global Digital Trade Center, a sixth-generation market in China, has launched, offering digital infrastructure and AI applications to merchants. Merchants like Fuduolashijia leverage AI for multilingual product videos and TikTok live streaming to reach global customers. Companies like Zhejiang Boran Education Technology Co., Ltd. are also developing new edutainment products and exploring export options.

articles.title: Samsung's Wild-Looking Tri-Fold Phone Makes Its Debut at the APEC Summit in S. Korea
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Galaxy phonemaker presented a new twin-hinged foldable device at a consumer tech show in Korea. The device is a foldable phone with a twin-hinged design.

articles.title: Samsung's Wild-Looking Tri-Fold Phone Debuts at APEC Summit in South Korea
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: Galaxy, a phonemaker (likely Samsung), demonstrated a new twin-hinged foldable phone at a Korean consumer tech show. This presentation signals a potential launch or introduction of the innovative device to the public.

articles.title: Meet NEO: The $20,000 humanoid assistant aiming to fully automate your home chores
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: 1X Technologies introduced NEO, a humanoid robot designed for ordinary homes. Priced at $20,000 or a $499/month subscription, NEO is targeted for delivery in 2026. The company is positioning NEO as the world's first mass-market home robot assistant.

articles.title: Honda 0 Alpha SUV concept debuts, India launch likely in 2027
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Honda debuted the Alpha SUV concept, signaling a potential launch in India. The new SUV represents Honda's expansion into new product categories.

articles.title: Amneal Receives U.S. FDA Tentative Approval for Beclomethasone Dipropionate HFA Inhalation Aerosol
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A company introduced its first metered-dose inhalation (MDI) product. This launch is expected to establish a new growth vector for the company.

articles.title: This Robot Is Ready to Fold Your Laundry. It'll Only Cost You $20K
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: 1X, a California startup, plans to introduce Neo, a humanoid robot, into homes as early as next year.

articles.title: Meta's AI tools are going rogue and churning out some very strange ads
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Meta's generative AI ad system is producing unexpected results, with advertisers noticing the platform conjuring up bizarre outcomes. True Classic's head of marketing shared an experience on X.

articles.title: Tennis Shoes in 2026: Redefining Power, Precision, and Style
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: XINZIRAIN is designing and crafting new performance footwear. This innovation comes as the global tennis footwear market is projected to exceed USD 4.2 billion by 2026.

articles.title: SteelSeries Arctis Nova Elite vs SteelSeries Arctis Nova Pro Wireless: I compare the two titanic ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: SteelSeries is comparing the Arctis Nova Elite and the Arctis Nova Pro Wireless, highlighting key differences between the two headsets.

articles.title: ZTE hosts ZTE Broadband User Congress 2025 in Mexico city under the theme "AI Boosting ...
articles.author: The Register
articles.summary: ZTE is proposing its "AI x Optical" solution. This solution aims to help operators shift their business model. The shift is from selling bandwidth to providing computing power as a service.

articles.title: OnePlus 15 with Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, OxygenOS 16 to launch in India on ...
articles.author: Live Mint
articles.summary: OnePlus will debut the OnePlus 15 in India on November 13th. The phone features the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 processor, OxygenOS 16, and will be available in three color variants and will go on sale the same day.

articles.title: WEKA Announces New NeuralMesh Architecture Built for NVIDIA BlueField-4
articles.author: TDN
articles.summary: A company introduced a revolutionary AI platform design. The platform eliminates CPU requirements and delivers breakthrough performance density. It also features linear scalability and exceptional power efficiency for enterprise AI factories.

articles.title: 7 Ways AI Design Tools Are Changing the Future of Branding
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: CapCut Web, powered by Seedream 4.0, introduces a creative platform that simplifies branding with features like AI logo generation, background removal, and automated visual consistency across platforms.  The platform allows users to quickly create professional-looking logos and visuals, customize designs, and generate content, offering startups and marketers affordable design power and faster creative turnaround.

articles.title: A 79-year old and a 93 year old re-team to make a new movie. Who says Hollywood is out of fresh ideas?
articles.summary: Apple is reportedly developing a new, larger Apple Watch, potentially around 50mm, expected to be announced in September alongside the new iPhone. This redesign, the first since the Series 4 in 2018, could feature a larger battery and new sensors like a blood glucose monitor.

articles.title: सामसङ नेपालद्वारा ‘शार्क ट्यांक नेपाल' का शार्कलाई ग्यालेक्सी जेड फोल्ड ७ प्रस्तुत
articles.author: कान्तिपुर संवाददाता
articles.summary: Samsung Nepal has launched the new Galaxy Z Fold 7. According to Samsung, the new model embodies innovation and versatility with its expansive display and multitasking capabilities. It also includes revolutionary design, display, and AI-supported features.
